archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Consume Available Capacity
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Allocate planned or actual capacity availability to the respective capacity demand for a given time period.

properties.value: Consume Available Capacity allocates capacity availability to capacity demand for a given time period. The allocation may identify the available capacity is not enough to satisfy demand or that there is too much capacity for a given time period. This information is communicated to the Monitor Capacity processes.
